titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow tax-exempt bond financing for fixed-wing emergency medical aircraft.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1496-1497)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
7/17/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt fixed-wing aircraft used to provide acute care emergency medical services from certain restrictions on tax-exempt bond financing.
